tool_description: Creates visual representations of chromosome segments showing shared DNA regions between related individuals.

profile_ids.description: List of profile IDs to include in visualization

display_format.description: Output format: svg, png, pdf, html

minimum_segment_display.description: Minimum segment size to display in cM

error_messages: Invalid profile IDs: One or more profile IDs are not found.
Invalid chromosome range: Chromosomes must be 1-22, X, Y, or MT.
Invalid display format: Use one of [svg, png, pdf, html].
Invalid color scheme: Use one of [rainbow, grayscale, custom].
Invalid segment size: minimum_segment_display must be between 0.1 and 50.0.
usage: Provide profile_ids for comparison and select chromosome_range of interest. Adjust minimum_segment_display to control detail level.

visualization_url.description: URL or path to generated visualization

chromosomes_shown.description: List of chromosomes included in visualization
